name: Clion
description:
Clion is a C/C++ IDE. It is featured with fast import start, intelligent code assist, built-in tool and integration debugger, supports multiple programming language, plugins extention and so on. And it supports version control system, command line tools, custom editor and so on.
You need to get a licence to use this software after the evaluation period.

zh_CN.description:
CLion是一个开发C和C ++的集成开发环境，它具有快速导入启动、智能编码辅助、内置工具和集成调试器、支持多种编程语言以及插件扩展等功能，还支持版本控制系统、命令行工具、编辑器自定义等功能。
该版本需要您自行购买长期使用授权。
zh_CN.name: CLion
